nodes.text: The Azure Defense Fleet was the fleet stationed on the planet Azure, led by General Solomahal. It consisted of a small amount of starfighters and other vessels.

The most well-known of the fleet's actions was at the Battle of Azure Spaceport during the Clone Wars. Here, they attempted to hold off a massive droid fleet with the help of Senator Padmé Amidala, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Siri Tachi, and Anakin Skywalker to protect a vital machine called a codebreaker, developed by Talesan Fry, that could listen in on enemy communication. They suffered casualties and were forced into a retreat, but the group was not eliminated entirely nor disbanded.

The fleet consisted of planetary starships and a handful of clone troopers, which were stationed specifically because of the tiny planet's stealth and unimportance in the war. Many of them were lost in the Azure battle, but some of their best pilots managed to survive the fight under the leadership of Jedi General Skywalker and Lieutenant Banno.
